{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = USB 2.0 Cable-Powered 4-Port Hub |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Targus |model = PAUH210U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/22/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Targus PAUH210U |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Female B |size_class = mini
|vendor_id = 0424 |device_id = a700 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number -->
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = SMSC;USB20H04; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 4 |1394ports = |tt = multi |power_led = green |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none -->
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 092636205782 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00008NG7G |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This hub comes with a dual-connector (one data+power and one power) USB cable for the device.
"UHT34003 V1.0" appears to be silkscreened on the board.
The '''[[SMSC]]''' hub IC is marked with "[[SMSC]]", "USB20H04-JD", "F0407-A7C10", and "8R116626D".
[[Category:English Documentation]]
